name: coc-jedi
description: coc.nvim wrapper for the jedi-language-server for Python
author: Sam Roeca <samuel.roeca@gmail.com>

jedi.markupKindPreferred.description: The preferred MarkupKind for jedi-language-server messages. If omitted, defaults to client preferences

jedi.jediSettings.autoImportModules.description: Modules that will not be analyzed but imported. Improves autocompletion but loses goto definition

jedi.jediSettings.caseInsensitiveComplet.description: Completions are by default case insensitive.

jedi.jediSettings.debug.description: Enable jedi.set_debug_function, which prints Jedi debugging messages to stdout.

jedi.executable.command.description: The jedi-language-server executable. If omitted, coc-managed default is used

jedi.executable.args.description: Args passed to jedi-language-server executable. Ignored if command is null

jedi.codeAction.nameExtractFunction.description: Function name generated by the 'extract_function' codeAction

jedi.codeAction.nameExtractVariable.description: Variable name generated by the 'extract_variable' codeAction

jedi.completion.disableSnippets.description: Enable (or disable) diagnostics provided by Jedi

jedi.completion.resolveEagerly.description: Return all completion results in initial completion request

jedi.completion.ignorePatterns.description: A list of regular expressions. If any regular expression matches a completion, that completion is not returned to the client.

jedi.diagnostics.enable.description: Enable (or disable) diagnostics provided by Jedi

jedi.diagnostics.didChange.description: Run diagnostics on in-memory document change

jedi.diagnostics.didSave.description: Run diagnostics on document save (to disk)

jedi.hover.disable.class.all.description: Disable all hover text of type specified.

jedi.hover.disable.class.names.description: Disable hover text identified by name in list of type specified.

jedi.hover.disable.class.fullNames.description: Disable hover text identified by the fully qualified name in list of type specified.

jedi.hover.disable.function.all.description: Disable all hover text of type specified.

jedi.hover.disable.function.names.description: Disable hover text identified by name in list of type specified.

jedi.hover.disable.function.fullNames.description: Disable hover text identified by the fully qualified name in list of type specified.

jedi.hover.disable.instance.all.description: Disable all hover text of type specified.

jedi.hover.disable.instance.names.description: Disable hover text identified by name in list of type specified.

jedi.hover.disable.instance.fullNames.description: Disable hover text identified by the fully qualified name in list of type specified.

jedi.hover.disable.keyword.all.description: Disable all hover text of type specified.

jedi.hover.disable.keyword.names.description: Disable hover text identified by name in list of type specified.

jedi.hover.disable.keyword.fullNames.description: Disable hover text identified by the fully qualified name in list of type specified.

jedi.hover.disable.module.all.description: Disable all hover text of type specified.

jedi.hover.disable.module.names.description: Disable hover text identified by name in list of type specified.

jedi.hover.disable.module.fullNames.description: Disable hover text identified by the fully qualified name in list of type specified.

jedi.hover.disable.param.all.description: Disable all hover text of type specified.

jedi.hover.disable.param.names.description: Disable hover text identified by name in list of type specified.

jedi.hover.disable.param.fullNames.description: Disable hover text identified by the fully qualified name in list of type specified.

jedi.hover.disable.path.all.description: Disable all hover text of type specified.

jedi.hover.disable.path.names.description: Disable hover text identified by name in list of type specified.

jedi.hover.disable.path.fullNames.description: Disable hover text identified by the fully qualified name in list of type specified.

jedi.hover.disable.property.all.description: Disable all hover text of type specified.

jedi.hover.disable.property.names.description: Disable hover text identified by name in list of type specified.

jedi.hover.disable.property.fullNames.description: Disable hover text identified by the fully qualified name in list of type specified.

jedi.hover.disable.statement.all.description: Disable all hover text of type specified.

jedi.hover.disable.statement.names.description: Disable hover text identified by name in list of type specified.

jedi.hover.disable.statement.fullNames.description: Disable hover text identified by the fully qualified name in list of type specified.

jedi.workspace.extraPaths.description: Add additional paths for Jedi's analysis. Useful with vendor directories, packages in a non-standard location, etc.

jedi.workspace.symbols.maxSymbols.description: Maximum number of symbols returned by a call to `workspace/symbols`

jedi.workspace.symbols.ignoreFolders.description: Performance optimization that sets names of folders that are ignored for the workspace symbols action.
